body:
Hi! My name is Yuri, I'm an old player, but now I'm back, I hope to have a great time with you all! about me:

- 17 years old
- I'm a men
- I'm from the Falkland Islands
- I enjoy play minecraft

See you later!

title: vYuri! :') Hey

replies.body: This an ama or just an intro? Either way... Hi!

replies.body: Hey there! Welcome back, i'm glad you decided to return! :) The server has had many changes to it recently, if you have any questions about them or anything else feel free to ask me or another staff member. Hopefully I can see you in game some time, enjoy your stay!
replies.body_tagged: Hey there! Welcome back, i'm glad you decided to return! :) The server has had many changes to it recently, if you have any questions about them or anything else feel free to ask me or another staff member. Hopefully I can see you in game some time, enjoy your stay!

replies.body: We are from another network, but we want to start playing competitively here, is this a problem?
replies.body_tagged: We are from another network, but we want to start playing competitively here, is this a problem?

replies.body: No, its a compliment if anything.
replies.body_tagged: No, its a compliment if anything.

Of course, If you overpower Proximity, its going down (Jk)

No, no problem, welcome! (:

replies.body:
So?
I know you're bad but I didn't expect you getting till that point.

replies.body: if i'm from OCN, What is the problem? because i'm not a "bad" player
replies.body_tagged: if i'm from OCN, What is the problem? because i'm not a "bad" player

replies.body: I don't believe he meant to imply that you were a bad pvper. I know Outy and he has told me about the respect he has for several ocn players. I believe he was just stating that you were from OCN as you had brought up the topic that you were from another network. Avicus forums have a different vibe then OCN. It's a bit more relaxed (don't mind the flame wars) but trust me until you give people a good reason to have a problem with you the community is welcoming and positive. :)
